channel.title: Edge computing on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Edge computing on FEEC/UNICAMP IA382 - Seminar in Computer Engineering

item.title: Sensing Without Seeing: EM Approaches to High-resolution Non-contact Detection
item.description: Abstract # Electromagnetic (EM) sensing is rapidly emerging as a compelling alternative to traditional visual and optical methods in real-time detection, offering advantages in sensitivity, selectivity, and resilience in harsh environments or complex sensing medium.

item.title: Latest trends on supporting an energy-efficient and resilient IoT-Edge-Cloud continuum
item.description: Abstract # The Edge to Cloud continuum defines the overall computing, network and data management required to handle services across an Internet of Things (IoT).

item.title: Holographic Type Communication: a future nearer than ever
item.description: Abstract # This keynote talk will first give an introduction about Immersive communications in 6G systems, highlighting Holographic-Type Communications (HTC).
